3.title: Develop your career in the best way

about.title: Welcome to Dandela Academy – the online school preparing tomorrow’s talents
about.subtitle: We contribute to training and professional growth, putting artificial intelligence and digital at the heart of learning.
goals: Learn practical and up-to-date digital skills
Benefit from AI-guided courses adapted to your level

services.title: Dandela Academy – A springboard for your career

about.title: About
about.paragraph-1: Dandela Academy is a professional training school, certified and approved by INEFOP, placing innovation and technology at the heart of learning. Our goal is to prepare both students and professionals with the digital skills essential in today’s job market.

ul.title: We offer a modern, flexible, and interactive learning environment that combines:
content: Support from qualified and passionate instructors
Use of artificial intelligence as a teaching tool to personalize and enhance the learning experience

about.paragraph-2: Through this approach, Dandela Academy aims to bridge the gap between traditional education and the needs of a constantly evolving job market.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph-1: Our mission is to democratize access to digital and professional training, so that every student and professional, regardless of their background, can acquire the skills necessary to succeed.

ul.title: Specifically, we commit to:
content: Providing quality education adapted to international standards
Offering practical programs designed around real cases and modern business tools
Developing learners’ critical thinking, creativity, and adaptability to technological changes
Reducing geographic and social barriers to education through a 100% online format

mission.paragraph-2: At Dandela Academy, we believe learning should be a lever for inspiration, autonomy, and professional growth.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.paragraph-1: We envision a future where every African student and professional can succeed thanks to digital skills. Dandela Academy aspires to become a reference center in Lusophone and Francophone Africa, recognized for the quality of its training, innovative pedagogy, and valuable certifications.

ul.title: We want to actively contribute to Africa’s digital transformation by:
content: Training a new generation of competent and confident professionals
Providing modern and accessible tools to those who previously lacked opportunities to learn
Encouraging entrepreneurship and the creation of local solutions through digital tools

vision.paragraph-2: Our vision goes beyond training: it is a societal project aimed at empowering youth and professionals to shape the future of their countries and continent.

inefop.title: Inefop
inefop.paragraph-1: The value of a diploma or certification lies in its recognition. That’s why Dandela Academy is certified and approved by INEFOP, the National Institute of Employment and Professional Training. This official recognition guarantees quality and credibility for all our students and partners.

ul.title: Specifically, this means that:
content: Our diplomas and certificates are recognized by institutions and employers
The skills acquired at Dandela Academy open doors to employment and career growth
Learners benefit from training that complies with national and international standards

inefop.paragraph-2: Our ambition is that every certificate issued by Dandela Academy becomes a true asset in the job market, in Angola and internationally.
